welcomeMessage: Find a city you can call home
introPar1: We're going to ask you some questions to help determine which cities will be best for you.
introPar2: We will not be recording any personal information.
profileFamily: Tell us a bit about your family so we can help find the best city for you.
profileNumber: Number of people in your family (including you)
profileAge: Select each age group that matches someone in your family
profileImportant: Let us know what's important to you. We've selected some items already based on the ages and number of people in your family.
noneFound: No results found. Try searching for something else.
highestScoring: Here are some of the highest scoring measurements in this city based on what was important to you. (Scores are calculated per capita where applicable.)
book: Book an appointment and learn more
filterTip: Click the categories to filter the fact cards
